content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded the personal property right to a vw passat vehicle while the defendant was also awarded a vw passat vehicle the applicant will be responsible for any taxes owed to the state tax inspectorate and the defendant will be responsible for any obligations towards a third party ab bank consumer credit agreement the legal text mentions several articles related to matrimonial property including the division of shares establishing the balance of assets protecting the rights of creditors and the possibility of deviating from an equal division of community property the applicant filed a court action to dissolve their marriage and requested the establishment of residence for their children payment of maintenance division of property and recognition of debts the defendant admitted to the claims and the court closed the proceedings based on this admission the court granted the dissolution of the marriage and awarded the applicant the right to personal property the defendant was ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings there are obligations towards the state tax inspectorate and a third party bank which the defendant is responsible for the defendant was also ordered to pay the applicant €600 in costs and is exempt from paying the costs of the civil proceedings to the state budget
